name: Kaiten
headline: Find culinary products and experiences from great makers everywhere
description:
Kaiten is a discovery app that gives you access to culinary products and experiences from quality makers around the world. 
We are home to hundreds of makers from around the world including restaurants, chefs, farmers, vineyards and even knife makers and ceramicists. Find new ways to enjoy the culinary world every day. A special bottle of wine, soy sauce from a 100 year old brewery in Kyoto, working a day at a Michelin star restaurant - if amazing people make it and sell it, you'll find it on Kaiten.

founders.name: Alex Matsenov, Founder
founders.description: Alex is the co-founder and CEO of Gauss Money. Alex led credit at Nordea Bank and MDM Bank. He's a 3x founder, 2x YC. Alex has an advance degree in machine learning, was a late stage venture investor in the machine learning space, and is a huge fan of fundamental physics and artificial intelligence research.

founders.name: Daniel Shein, Founder
founders.description: Life long engineer, 2nd life as restauranteur.

# Where'd you find them?
Just when you thought you were following the makers of the best food, coffee, knives, ceramics, and accessories,
along comes ![kaiten logo](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/static/media/kaiten_white-logo.aa58908d.svg)
## Perfect for Holidays & Winter
It's time for new harvests, warming drinks and preparing for holiday events and gifts
[![Olive Oil First Harvest 2024](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F293%2Fmesik%2FRISH_LAKISH_MESIK_18_SMALL-large.webp&w=3840&q=75)Limited EditionOlive Oil First Harvest 2024A beautiful hand crafted ceramic bottle made especially for storing and pouring award winning organic olive oil from Rish Lakish.](http://www.onkaiten.com/</makers/293/offerings/201/items/806>)[![Handmade Ceramic for Olive Oil](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F1%2Fceramic-oliveoil%2FKAITEN_CERAMIC_BOTTLE_33-medium.webp&w=3840&q=75)Handmade Ceramic for Olive OilAfter working with amazing olive oil makers, we set out to make a wonderful way to pour their oils](http://www.onkaiten.com/</makers/1/offerings/205/items/765>)[![Parmesan of the Desert](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F296%2Fproducts%2FIMGL0392-large.webp&w=3840&q=75)NewParmesan of the DesertThese bedoin yogurt stones are packed with umami and salty flavor](http://www.onkaiten.com/</makers/296/offerings/209/items/783>)[![Rescued from the Vine to Your Plate](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F293%2Ffarm-to-people%2FUntitled%20Session270729-medium&w=3840&q=75)Curated by Adeena SussmanRescued from the Vine to Your PlateThis innovative project takes fruits and vegetables that would have been left to rot on the vine because it wasn't good enough to sell and creates delicious condiments](http://www.onkaiten.com/</makers/293/offerings/215/items/822>)[![Serve with Style](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F305%2Finuse%2FIMGL0047132-large&w=3840&q=75)Only 20 leftServe with StyleMasterfully hand crafted by 3rd generation wood workers, these plates and bowls add warmth and beauty to whatever you serve on them.](http://www.onkaiten.com/</makers/305/offerings/211/items/786>)[![Hand Forged Santoku Knife](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F221%2Fproducts%2FARNO0516-medium.webp&w=3840&q=75)Hand Forged Santoku KnifeA versatile knife for any kitchen, with local wood handle and premium steel blade](http://www.onkaiten.com/</makers/221/offerings/131/items/544>)[![Olive Oil Box Sets](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F293%2Fboxsets%2FRISHLAKISH_Untitled-Session271109-medium.webp&w=3840&q=75)Olive Oil Box SetsChoose from a selection of box sets of organic olive made by hand in the north of Israel](http://www.onkaiten.com/</makers/293/offerings/201/items/775>)
![Table with seat pulled up](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ftable.cb04b022.jpg&w=1920&q=75)![Table with seat pulled up](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ftable-large.78881fd4.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
## Let Us Curatefor You
Our team is constantly traveling the world finding amazing makers and products from traditions in Japan to modern takes in California.
Send us a message, and we'll be your direct line to all great things culinary.
[ Ask Kaiten](http://www.onkaiten.com/</ask>)
About Kaiten
Kaiten is a platform where food lovers can connect with culinary artisans. We offer hand-picked products crafted by makers from various regions, serving their distinctive touch to the Kaiten community. We believe that the positive and sustainable path of the evolving industry we love, relies on the genuine connections we build between quality and community.
There are more great makers than ever
From private dinners at a vineyard to delicious hot sauces for home, more people are creating businesses the revolve around creating dining experiences.
Team
Kaiten is a team of restauranteurs, food photographers, writers and just people who adore the industry and the people in it. We’re building Kaiten to protect and grow the industry we love.
![The Challenge](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdining-table.7963f1e6.jpg&w=1920&q=75)
The Challenge
The restaurant business model is dying. Already low profits are disppearing as labor costs, food costs and rent go up.
About Kaiten
Kaiten is a platform where food lovers can connect with culinary artisans. We offer hand-picked products crafted by makers from various regions, serving their distinctive touch to the Kaiten community. We believe that the positive and sustainable path of the evolving industry we love, relies on the genuine connections we build between quality and community.
There are more great makers than ever
From private dinners at a vineyard to delicious hot sauces for home, more people are creating businesses the revolve around creating dining experiences.
Team
Kaiten is a team of restauranteurs, food photographers, writers and just people who adore the industry and the people in it. We’re building Kaiten to protect and grow the industry we love.
![The Challenge](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdining-table.7963f1e6.jpg&w=1920&q=75)
The Challenge
The restaurant business model is dying. Already low profits are disppearing as labor costs, food costs and rent go up.
![Table with seat pulled up](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Finstagram-on-phone.1d7d4a0d.jpg&w=1920&q=75)![Table with seat pulled up](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Finstagram-on-phone-large.c417c83f.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
## A dose of delightfor your everyday
Good food is not just for special occassions. Use Kaiten to findways to make more moments in you life a culinary joy.
[ Follow Kaiten](http://www.onkaiten.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/onkaiten>)
## Kaiten Exclusives
Products and projects made available exclusively through Kaiten
[![The Perfect Gin & Tonic](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F1%2Fgin-and-tonic%2FKAITEN_PRODUCTS_018-medium.webp&w=3840&q=75)Back in StockThe Perfect Gin & TonicCombining crafts from Japan & Israel to elevate a classic drink.](http://www.onkaiten.com/</makers/1/offerings/203/items/785>)
[![Ika Chocolate x Gastronome Israel Sher](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F295%2Fika-cherries%2Fcharry-praline-with-marmalade-medium.webp&w=3840&q=75)Sold OutIka Chocolate x Gastronome Israel SherInspired by the wide biodiversity of sweet and sour cherries found at the Matityahu Farm in the Upper Galilee, Israel, this collection explores the spectrum of flavor of cherries.](http://www.onkaiten.com/</landing/202>)
[![KAITEN X NURIEL FORGE](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F221%2FNURI0352-medium.webp&w=3840&q=75)Sold OutNew Knife Launching SoonKAITEN X NURIEL FORGEHand forged near the Sea of Galilee, this knife is the perfect sidekick to any chef knife.](http://www.onkaiten.com/</landing/190>)
[![KAITEN X STERN-LICHT HERBAL TONICS](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F288%2FNOA_LEVI_236225_B-medium.webp&w=3840&q=75)KAITEN X STERN-LICHT HERBAL TONICSCreate delicious cocktails and non-alcoholic drinks with tonic syrups made from aromatic plants, citrus fruits and flowers harvested from Mount Gilboa and Negev Desert in Israel.](http://www.onkaiten.com/</landing/192>)
[![KAITEN X HILA HOCHMAN](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F291%2Fbox%2FUntitledCatalog1900-medium.webp&w=3840&q=75)Sold OutKAITEN X HILA HOCHMANCitrusy confections made from the seasonal fruits and herbs growing in Hila's backyard.](http://www.onkaiten.com/</landing/196>)
[![David Zarbiv Spring 2023 Chocolates](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F292%2FDZ_051-medium.webp&w=3840&q=75)Sold OutDavid Zarbiv Spring 2023 ChocolatesA collection of unique chocolate treats made especially to please everyone around the dinner table.](http://www.onkaiten.com/</landing/198>)
[![Kaiten x Asif Deser Curation](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F290%2Fdesert%2Fbox%2FBAMIDBAR2355-medium.webp&w=3840&q=75)Sold OutKaiten x Asif Deser CurationA Culinary Curation of the Israeli Desert.](http://www.onkaiten.com/</>)
[![Kaiten x Nura](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsizedimages.onkaiten.com%2F285%2Fphotosession%2FIMG_0603-medium.webp&w=3840&q=75)Sold OutKaiten x Nuralunch and guided tour throughout the surrounding nature of chef Nurit "Nura" Hertz's humble home in a small village in the Judean Hills.](http://www.onkaiten.com/</landing/177>)
![](http://www.onkaiten.com/_next/static/media/kaiten_white-logo.aa58908d.svg)
[](http://www.onkaiten.com/<http:/www.instagram.com/onkaiten>)[](http://www.onkaiten.com/<https:/www.tiktok.com/@onkaiten>)[](http://www.onkaiten.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/onkaiten/>)[](http://www.onkaiten.com/<https:/twitter.com/onkaiten>)[](http://www.onkaiten.com/<https:/pinterest.com/onkaiten>)

generated_description:
**Kaiten: Rediscover the Culinary World**

Founded in 2019 and nestled in New York City as part of Y Combinator's Batch W20, Kaiten is your gateway to a treasure trove of culinary delights sourced from skilled artisans across the globe. Their mission is clear and passionate: to connect food lovers with remarkable culinary products and experiences crafted by exceptional makers.

Imagine a platform where you can find everything from artisanal soy sauce dating back to a 100-year-old brewery in Kyoto, to a day spent in a Michelin-starred restaurant kitchen. Kaiten brings together a diverse community of makers—chefs, farmers, vineyards, knife makers, ceramicists, and more—allowing you to explore new flavors and experiences every day.

**What Makes Kaiten Special?**
- **Expert Curation**: Their team of food lovers—comprised of restaurateurs, food photographers, and writers—travels the world, hand-picking unique products that embody the spirit of their makers and the culinary traditions they represent.
- **Diverse Offerings**: From exquisite wines to handcrafted kitchen tools, their catalog is filled with exclusive items that aren't just products; they're stories waiting to enhance your dining experience.
- **Sustainable Practices**: Kaiten believes in the power of genuine connections between quality and community. They curate their selection to support artisans and promote sustainable culinary practices, addressing challenges in the ever-evolving restaurant industry.

**Stay Tuned for Seasonal Delights**
KaiTen is keen on keeping the culinary excitement alive for every season, offering products that enhance your experience in your kitchen and at the table. With holiday offerings featuring limited-edition olive oils, unique ceramics, and more, there’s always something to celebrate.

**Get Involved**: If you're seeking culinary joy, Kaiten is ready to assist. Whether you need help selecting the perfect item or exploring experiences, their team is just a message away. 

To discover the myriad of culinary products waiting for you, head over to [Kaiten's website](http://www.onkaiten.com) and elevate your daily meals into exceptional culinary moments!
